title: 18 - Investigateighteen Discovery
description: Karen and Georgia's favorite murders this week are creepazoids Lawrence Singleton and Franklin Delano Floyd, and boy, do they fucking suck. Plus lots of small (murder) talk and personal stories plus all the staying sexy and not getting murdered you've come to know and love. Enjoy, murderionos!
